title: this is my smurf account and im bored of playing solo
body: anyone want to smurf to diamond? my main account is diamond 1 im a jg main only using elise and zac to diamond add me ig. pls no one looking for a boost

replies.body: lol looking at that match history you aint a smurf

hey FHMarshy I know u don't remember me but like 5 months ago when I said my account got hacked thnx for actually trying to get a rioter person to ban it .I just want to say thnx for the help and that account got banned. also if you want I am always free to play with people. yeah I might be a silver 5 but I aint bad.so if u looking for some fun just friend me and we will play{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
support smrf, don't typically play support on this accnt as I'm trying to learn other roles but can play with u if u want a support
